participant_abstract.sent: Project manager started the meeting and had us introduce ourselves, he gave a brief outline of the project and we all provided some initial ideas.

participant_actions.sent: Project Manager - work on meeting outline for next meeging.
Marketing - Think about different marketing angles of the product we have discusses.
Interface des - Think about ways to make product more user friendly.
Industral des - Think about ways to make product work in ways we have discusses.

participant_decisions.sent: No really decisions were made, although there was general discussion of the size/shape of the remote, the type of buttons and the coloring.
There seemed to be a general agreement that the buttons should be concave and that there should be some sort of colored face plates avalable for the remotes.
